description:
The Leading Java and Kotlin IDE

Code-centric IDE, focused on your productivity. Full Java EE support, deep code understanding, best debugger, refactorings, everything right out of the box...
IntelliJ IDEA 2024.3 EAP 6 is out with the following updates:
- Revamped “Structure” tool window
- Derived method generation for Spring Data repositories
- Streamlined GraalVM native image debugging
Learn more about these and other new features in our blog post.
